resources.string: If app already installed, uninstall it first
If you got NOT EXISTS error use custom file manager to select file
Thanks jen94! Updated by fcaronte & Rikj000
Enable if you use Oppo, Realme or OnePlus phone

Use "Reset Default" button to open default Google PackageInstaller
if you wrongly set as default and popup won't show anymore.

After touch "Reset Default" button,
search for "Clear Default Preference" PS.

If the button gives an error,
it is because your phone use a different PackageInstaller
and so you need to manually search on your phone setting.
Enable if you use rooted (LineageOS) phone
Can\'t enable, device is not Rooted
